com.owon.uppersoft.dso.wf

Class WaveForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.owon.uppersoft.dso.wf.WaveForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRefSource, Decorate, IWF, WF, IView

    public class WaveForm
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView, WF, IRefSource
    WaveForm，波形，就提供的点进行绘制 RT时获取插值后的数据点1k~4k，DM时获取原始的采样点25~10M
